column1: Neuilly-sur-Marne is a commune in the eastern suburbs of Paris
column2: France. It is located 13.1 km (8.1 mi) from the center of Paris.
a third of the territory of Neuilly-sur-Marne was detached and became the commune of Neuilly-Plaisance.

column1: Neuilly-sur-Marne is served by no station of the Paris Métro
column3: or suburban rail network. The closest station to Neuilly-sur-Marne is Neuilly-Plaisance station on Paris RER line A. This station is located in the neighboring commune of Neuilly-Plaisance
column4: 1.3 km (0.81 mi) from the town center of Neuilly-sur-Marne.
